title: A Deadly Intrusion: Episode 34
description:
In the episode of the UK True Crime Weekly Podcast we head back to October 1983, when Culture Club topped the UK charts and Neil Kinnock had just been elected leader of the Labour Party.

A family wedding should have been a joyous affair.  But then the intruder arrived at the house....

www.uktruecrime.com
www.patreon.com/uktruecrime
